title: How to Get a Master Ball in Pok√©mon Ruby

steps.title: You must have been to Mt.
steps.content: You must have been to Mt. Pyre to see the Blue Orb taken and witnessed the submarine being stolen from Slateport to do this.

steps.title: Go to the Team Aqua Hideout in the north-east of Lilycove (you will need to use Surf) and keep heading north.
steps.content: Go to the Team Aqua Hideout in the north-east of Lilycove (you will need to use Surf) and keep heading north.

steps.title: Enter through the door and you will see two white circles.
steps.content: Enter through the door and you will see two white circles. These are teleporters.

steps.title: Take the one on the left.
steps.content: Take the one on the left.

steps.title: As you are taken to the next screen, you will see a teleporter to the south.
steps.content: As you are taken to the next screen, you will see a teleporter to the south. Walk to it and take it.

steps.title: Now take the teleporters to the left, left and left again.
steps.content: Now take the teleporters to the left, left and left again.

steps.title: When you reach the final row of teleporters, take the one farthest to the left.
steps.content: When you reach the final row of teleporters, take the one farthest to the left.

steps.title: You should reach a room with four item balls.
steps.content: You should reach a room with four item balls. The two on the right are Electrodes, be careful.

steps.title: Pick up the Nugget and then you will be able to reach the Master Ball!
steps.content: Pick up the Nugget and then you will be able to reach the Master Ball!
